about: Senior Software Engineer with 20+ years of experience building and scaling distributed systems, cloud platforms, and large-scale service-oriented architectures. Currently designing and operating bank-grade cloud deployment platforms at Klarna, managing centralized cloud infrastructure for hundreds of microservices across development, staging, performance, and production environments. Focus on ensuring high availability, auto-scaling, cost efficiency, and secure operations for mission-critical financial services.

Expert in multiple programming languages (Go, TypeScript, Java, Python, Perl, C/C++, C#, Erlang) and cloud-native technologies including AWS (ECS, Lambda, Step Functions, EC2, RDS, VPC, Route53, S3), Kubernetes, Docker, and infrastructure automation tools (Ansible, Terraform). Extensive hands-on experience with various database systems (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, DB2, DynamoDB, Solr), message queues (ActiveMQ), and full-stack development including Vue.js front-end experience.

Proven track record in system architecture design, performance optimization, capacity planning, and troubleshooting complex distributed systems. Successfully managed large-scale R&D and test server infrastructure, both on-premise and cloud-based, including installation, upgrade, monitoring, and maintenance. Experienced in high-availability and stability testing, server performance analysis, and supporting customer deployments and troubleshooting.

Strong technical leader with experience mentoring engineers, leading cross-functional teams, and driving technical initiatives. Former QA team lead with extensive background in large-scale test automation design, CI/CD pipeline setup and management (Jenkins, GitLab, Git/Gerrit), and systematic testing of enterprise-grade systems. Experience managing infrastructure for development teams and enabling smooth deployment workflows including green/blue and canary deployment strategies.

Passionate about automation, continuous learning, and staying current with emerging technologies in cloud infrastructure, distributed systems, and software engineering practices. Known for thorough problem-solving, systematic approach to complex challenges, and dedication to delivering high-quality, reliable, scalable solutions. Strong advocate for best practices in infrastructure as code, observability, and DevOps culture.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer | Code-to-Cloud Platform Team
experience.description: Klarna Engineering Platform (KEP) Domain - Code-to-Cloud is part of Klarna Engineering Platform, providing a common, stable platform for Klarna services.
bullets: Managed centralized cloud deployment platform for most of Klarna's services, ensuring secure, stable, cost-efficient operations
Designed and maintained bank-grade applications with auto-scaling and high availability for production workloads
Managed service deployments, scaling, networking, certificates, and secrets across dev, staging, performance, and production environments
Built and operated centralized AWS interfaces for service lifecycle management
Implemented smooth upgrade and deployment workflows, including green/blue and canary promotion strategies
Monitored and optimized infrastructure metrics including CPU/memory, AWS ECS task instances, network-layer metrics, Step Functions, and Lambda executions
experience.technologies: TypeScript, Go, AWS ECS, AWS Step Functions, AWS Lambda

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Golang developer at payment team. The automated digital telco enabler.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Developed Media Asset Management system, modular and distributed system
Maintained system test suite with Python
experience.technologies: Golang, Perl, Python, C#, C, C++, Kubernetes, REST API, Microservices, ActiveMQ, Postgres, DB2, Oracle, Solr, Memcache, RedHat, AWS, S3, Cloud Native

experience.title: QA & Release Manager
experience.description: System test/function test and release management of an IoT product. Radio mesh network using IETF 6LoWPAN (IPv6)/RPL CoAP open protocols. Responsible for test plan/test execution/test automation/CI setup and maintenance, large performance test, setup/automate test cluster with load balancer in AWS, high availability/characteristics/stability test. Development operation and live operation, support for product roll out and troubleshooting.

experience.title: System Tester
experience.description: System test of RBS (Radio Base Station) platform. Write/Execute test-case with Erlang CT/OTP. System test automation. Performance/Capacity/Robustness/Reliability test.

experience.title: TCM & Test Automation Developer
experience.description: Test Configuration Management (TCM) of Core IMS, CSCF (SIP server). Setup test environment for function test, both real hardware and simulator. Software version control and test configuration management. Maintain Linux servers in lab. Function test automation (Perl, Linux shell). Develop test automation tools and scripts for system load test. System test.

experience.title: I&V Engineer / System Test Leader / Function Tester / Software Engineer
experience.location: Stockholm, Sweden | Beijing, China | Shanghai, China
experience.description: Various roles including function test of Core IMS, CSCF (SIP server) and Media Resource Server MRF, team leadership of IPWorks system test (6 team members), and block designer/function tester of AXE core network for CDMA2000.

projects.title: Klarna Code-to-Cloud Platform
description: Joined the Code-to-Cloud (C2C) team within Klarna Engineering Platform, contributing to the centralized cloud deployment platform that supports most of Klarna's microservices. Developed automated features for AWS infrastructure management and performed bug fixes and improvements to enhance platform stability and efficiency.

Worked within the existing platform structure to improve and extend features, focusing on service lifecycle management, deployments, scaling, and infrastructure monitoring. Refactored client code from TypeScript to Go to improve performance and maintainability.

Migrated Jenkins jobs for ECS sidecar upgrades to AWS Code Pipelines, modernizing the CI/CD workflow and improving deployment automation. Contributed to maintaining bank-grade cloud infrastructure with auto-scaling and high availability across development, staging, performance, and production environments.
projects.technologies: TypeScript, Go, AWS ECS, AWS Step Functions, AWS Lambda, AWS Code Pipeline, Jenkins, AWS Cloud Infrastructure

projects.title: Vizrt MAM Development
description: Developed Media Asset Management system, a modular and distributed system. Maintained system test suite with Python. Developed plugins for Variant customers.
projects.technologies: Golang, Perl, Python, C#, C, C++, Kubernetes, REST API, Microservices, ActiveMQ, Postgres, DB2, Oracle, Solr, Memcache, RedHat, AWS, S3, Cloud Native

projects.title: Connode Solution Test
description: Test environment setup, function test, and system test for IoT product. Radio mesh network using IETF 6LoWPAN (IPv6)/RPL CoAP open protocols. Responsible for test automation, CI setup and maintenance, large performance test, setup/automate test cluster with load balancer in AWS, high availability/characteristics/stability test. Agile way of working. Setup continuous integration for server and node side, created/maintained smoke test and daily regression test scripts.

projects.title: RBS Platform System Test
description: System test of RBS (Radio Base Station) platform. Agile/Scrum way of working. Mainly used Erlang/OTP/CT for test automation. All test-cases written in Erlang with Common Test framework. Also used Perl/Linux shell scripts as helpers. Performed integration and system tests for different types of RBS platform, for WCDMA/LTE, multi-standard RBS etc.
projects.technologies: Erlang, OTP, CT, Perl, Linux Shell

projects.title: CSCF Test Environment Setup and Test Automation
description: Setup and maintained test environment for Core IMS, CSCF (SIP server). Used Perl and Linux shell scripts to create convenient work environment for testers. Ensured all servers were in healthy condition. Involved with MAIA sub-project - simulation of telecom server platform (TSP), responsible for integration to R&D development/test environment using VMware/Virtualbox, Soft-IP-routing (ospfd, zebra, openVPN), serving 20+ developers/testers.
projects.technologies: Perl, Linux Shell, VMware, Virtualbox, ClearCase, Subversion

projects.title: CSCF Test Automation and Regression Test
description: Troubleshooting failed test-cases, corrected errors in test-cases, wrote trouble reports if faults were found in CSCF. Test-case automation and maintained daily runs. Ensured all legacy functions were not broken when new CSCF releases were delivered. Managed around 6000 test-cases running every day.

projects.title: IPworks Development
description: IPworks mainly works as DNS/DHCP servers. Supports internal/external DNS, ACL, A/SRV/ENUM records, Dynamic DNS. Also has functions for ERH (External Resource handler) and SS7. MySQL cluster used for back-end data management. One of the key components of the whole IMS architecture. Agile/Scrum way of working.

projects.title: CSCF/MRF Development
description: Developed test-cases in Spirent (Protocol testing tool), function test of CSCF/MRF, working with protocols like SIP, diameter, LDAP, TCP/UDP etc, IP networking. Tested several features including system counter accuracy, Lawful Intercept, Number Portability, Third party registration etc.

projects.title: CDMA 2000 Development
description: AXE platform block design and function test, using Ericsson PLEX-C/ASA assembler language. FOA (Install First Official Application) in customer site.
